condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement Schedule 2 Section I B. | Description :Carry out the Project in accordance with the provisions ofthe GAAP and the Anti-Corruption Guidelines. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement Section IV | Description :Cause Wugong County: (a) by no later than June 30, 2016, to furnishto the Bank a time-bound action plan, prepared following TOR satisfactory to the Bank, to increase connections to the new watersupply system through regulation and incentives, and to terminate the use of ground water as the drinking source; | Due Date:30-Jun-2016

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement Section IV | Description :Cause Wugong County: (b) by no later than January 1, 2017, tocommence implementation of the action plan referred to in paragraph (a) of this Section, taking into account the comments, if any,made by the Bank thereon. | Due Date :01-Jan-2017
